title: Bug 24411[Welcome] Mouse click on link should select link
description: Bug 24411[Welcome] Mouse click on link should select link
OB: When clicking on a link in the welcome page, the appropriate action is executed, but the clicked link is not selected when the user returns to the welcome page.
EB: When clicking on a link in the welcome page, the clicked link should be selected when the user returns to the welcome page, providing more context.
SR:
1. Open build 20021001. 
2. Make sure you get a welcome page when you restart (Remove the welcome line in prefstore.ini of the workbench metadata). 
3. Click on any link in the welcome page. 
4. Observe that the appropriate action is executed, but the clicked link is not selected when you return to the welcome page.
